items.title: Samsung announces the Galaxy S26 and S26 Plus, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 for Galaxy chipset, starting at $899 and $1099, respectively, a $100 hike (Patrick Holland/CNET)
items.title_en: Samsung announces the Galaxy S26 and S26 Plus, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 for Galaxy chipset, starting at $899 and $1099, respectively, a $100 hike (Patrick Holland/CNET)
items.title_zh: 三星宣布推出 Galaxy S26 和 S26 Plus，配备适用于 Galaxy 芯片组的 Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5，起价分别为 899 美元和 1099 美元，上涨了 100 美元（Patrick Holland/CNET）

items.title: 财联社2月26日电，芝商所（CME）发布通知，由于技术问题，CME Globex金属和天然气期货及期权市场已暂停交易。
